name: Jelbert
description:
Jelbert

Jelbert is an endless runner, mixed with platform type of game.  If you are wondering how I came up with the name, it literally means the color green in my language!

In the past I have fallen down the hole of tackling projects that are too big and lose interest and track of so I created this.  I know that this is a small and simple game, but the purpose of this was to just release something to help gain confidence for future projects.  

Any feedback is much appreciated!
